resources.string: Check out the %s plant in the Android Sunflower app

string.name: watering_needs_prefix
string.translation_description: Prefix for the text describing how often a plant should be watered. Used in combination with watering_needs_suffix.

item.translation_description: Suffix for the text describing how often a plant should be watered, singular. Used in combination with watering_needs_prefix: 'Watering needs: every day'.
Suffix for the text describing how often a plant should be watered, plural. Used in combination with watering_needs_prefix: 'Watering needs: every 8 days'.

string.name: plant_details_title
string.translation_description: Title for the plant details screen where the user can see the details for a specific plant.

string.name: garden_empty
string.translation_description: Text that is shown on the 'My Garden' screen when no plants have been added to the user's garden

string.name: plant_date_header
string.translation_description: Text that is shown on each plant on the 'My Garden' screen which says the word Planted to show date of planting below

string.name: menu_item_share_plant
string.translation_description: The label for the Share menu item

string.name: gallery_title
string.translation_description: Title for the photo gallery screen

string.name: gallery_content_description
string.translation_description: Content description for the clickable image to navigate to the gallery screen

string.name: plant_detail_image_content_description
string.translation_description: Content description for the header / hero image that is show at the top of the plant detail screen.
